nodes.text: Oren was a male handler of the Exchange who was involved in weapon and spice trafficking. When Zeerid Korr joined the Exchange, Oren was assigned as his handler. Korr new almost nothing about Oren. Oren gave different assignments to Korr, mainly weapon smuggling operations. However, after several of those failed, Oren ordered Korr to complete a spice run, offering to clear his debt with the Exchange. Korr accepted, and although the spice was ultimately destroyed, Korr managed to disappear from the Exchange's knowledge. Oren never seemed very concerned about the safety or the Exchange's agents or about the morality of any of their assignments.
